description: A coronary stent is a small mesh-like tube that is placed in a narrowed or blocked coronary artery to restore blood flow.

attributes.name: Presence of Coronary Stent
attributes.description: Indicates whether a coronary stent is present or absent.

values.name: Absent
values.description: A coronary stent is not present.

attributes.name: Status
attributes.description: Indicates the status of the coronary stent.

values.name: New placement
values.description: The coronary stent has been newly placed.

values.name: Complication
values.description: There is a complication associated with the coronary stent.

values.name: Removed
values.description: The coronary stent has been removed.

attributes.name: Location
attributes.description: Indicates the location of the coronary stent.

values.name: Left coronary
values.description: The coronary stent is located in the left coronary artery.

values.name: Left anterior descending (LAD)
values.description: The coronary stent is located in the left anterior descending artery.

values.name: Left circumflex (LCx)
values.description: The coronary stent is located in the left circumflex artery.

values.name: Left obtuse marginal (OM)
values.description: The coronary stent is located in the left obtuse marginal artery.

values.name: Right coronary (RCA)
values.description: The coronary stent is located in the right coronary artery.

values.name: Right acute marginal
values.description: The coronary stent is located in the right acute marginal artery.

attributes.name: Type
attributes.description: Indicates the type of coronary stent.

attributes.name: In-Stent Restenosis
attributes.description: Indicates whether there is restenosis (re-narrowing) of the stented artery.

attributes.name: Stent Thrombosis
attributes.description: Indicates whether there is thrombosis (clot formation) within the stent.

attributes.name: Stent Fracture
attributes.description: Indicates whether there is a fracture in the coronary stent.

attributes.name: Peri-stent Leak
attributes.description: Indicates whether there is a leak around the coronary stent.

attributes.name: Edge Dissection
attributes.description: Indicates whether there is a dissection (tear) at the edge of the stent.
